commitResults.messageTitle: Added greeting and goodbye messages and renamed duke to ultron
Added echo for Ultron
Added add and list function to Ultron along with minor fixes to lines
Added task class with task marking and unmarking
Added todos, events and deadlines with more ui polishing
Added TextUiTesting to project

Added exception classes and exception handling for many scenarios i.e: Invalid task numbers for marking and unmarking tasks, empty task descriptions, missing date for deadlines and event tasks, and invalid inputs
Added delete function to list which was already an ArrayList, also increased length of separator line for longer output messages
Added new class Storage which handles storing and retrieval of the data necessary. File will be located in src/main/data. Corrupted files will return an empty list
Fixed path issues with storage class. New file related error handling have been added. Added in loading and saving of the data when Chaird.java is first launched and whenever the list is updated.
Bug fixes
Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
update .gitignore file to ignore the data directory when pushing
add date and time for deadline and event tasks
split Chaird.java class into more oop classes Ui, Tasklist, Parser, and Command. rewrite main logic of Chaird.java
organise all files into package chaird
Merge branch 'add-gradle-support'
set up build.gradle for project
add Junit tests to both Parser and Storage components
add JavaDoc headers for most classes, constructors and non-private methods
fix grammatical mistakes for JavaDoc
edit code following coding standards
add find function and relevant ui for the find function
add basic launcher for javafx
add GUI components for user interaction
commitResults.messageBody:
need to implement a GUI to enchance user interaction

use JavaFX to create dialog boxes and main window layout following
the template given
currently missing picture option

commitResults.messageTitle: add assertions to some methods
commitResults.messageBody:
assertion in Storage class to ensure that file path is correct
assertion in Chaird class to ensure that invalid commands return a ChairdException

commitResults.messageTitle: add assertion to ensure tasklist integrity
commitResults.messageBody: assertion in TaskList class to ensure that task addition increases the task count

commitResults.messageTitle: fix many code quality standard violations
commitResults.messageBody:
major fix is refactoring my getInd method to getIndex to ensure readability
refactored if else blocks in Parser.java to switch case for better clarity
improved variable naming conventions across multiple files

commitResults.messageTitle: add note feature for users to save notes
commitResults.messageBody:
added a new Note class to represent a note
updated the Parser, Storage, TaskList, and Ui classes to handle the new note feature
new Note class has isDone set to false always
new Note class cannot be marked or unmarked as done
